test_prompts.text: My mother just died and I don't know what to do.
I'm being bullied at work and it's destroying my mental health.
My teenager told me they're having suicidal thoughts.
I found out my partner has been lying to me for years.
I can't sleep. I keep replaying a mistake I made and I feel so ashamed.
How do I tell my friend their drinking is hurting everyone around them?
I'm exhausted from caring for my sick parent and I feel guilty for wanting it to end.
I failed at something I worked really hard for. What's the point of trying?
